thread.section_title: Skyline Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Stuart, Hythe U. K.
thread.title_full: Stuart, Hythe U. K. - Review of Skyline Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Stuart B
title: Stuart, Hythe U. K.
text: Stayed at the skyline for 3 nights 15/3/17. Check in was quick and staff very nice. Our room a junior suite was huge nice and clean and comfortable. Times Square is no more than 10 minutes walk away and that was in the aftermath of the blizzard that hit the day before, the only negative is directed at the Mexican restaurant attached to the hotel where I came across some very rude waiting staff. Thanks skyline had a great time
